mapper.insert: INSERT INTO User( user_email, user_pwd, user_nickname, user_gender, user_age , user_height, user_weight, user_img, user_reportedcount, enabled, user_grade ) VALUES( #{user_email},#{user_pwd}, #{user_nickname} ,#{user_gender},#{user_age}, 0, 0,'user.png', 0, 1, 'regular')
mapper.update: update User set user_grade = 'withdrawal', user_nickname = 'N', user_gender = 'N', user_age = 0, user_height = 0, user_weight = 0, user_img='N', user_deletedate = now() where user_email= #{user_email}
mapper.select: select avg(user_weight) from user where user_height=#{param1} and user_gender=#{param2}
